tasks.label: Build Example (Hello World)
args: cd examples\01_helloworld && sh-elf-gcc -m2 -mb -O2 -fomit-frame-pointer -nostartfiles -I..\..\include -c ..\..\src\crt0.s -o crt0.o && sh-elf-gcc -m2 -mb -O2 -fomit-frame-pointer -nostartfiles -I..\..\include -c main.c -o main.o && sh-elf-ld -T ..\..\saturn.ld -o game.elf crt0.o main.o && sh-elf-objcopy -O binary game.elf 0.BIN
